short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AI-powered conversation assistance for dating platforms

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Dating AI Assistant – Your Smart Conversation Partner
Enhance your dating app conversations with Dating AI Assistant, a Chrome extension designed to help you craft authentic and engaging messages.

Key Features:

Smart Suggestions: Receive personalized message ideas tailored to your conversations.
Intuitive Interface: Activate the AI assistant with a simple shortcut (Ctrl+Shift+H) or click.
Customizable: Adjust tone and style to match your personality.
Privacy-Focused: Conversations stay private, processed locally, with secure API communication.
Why Choose Dating AI Assistant?

Break the ice with ease.
Overcome writer’s block.
Maintain authentic, flowing conversations effortlessly.
Note: An API key is required for full functionality. Setup instructions are provided post-installation.
